item.title: To Restore Democracy Trump Will Have To Overcome Administrative State Tyranny
item.description: The second Trump administration was elected as the antidote to the administrative state — to make radical changes in personnel and policy.

item.title: The GOP Establishment Is A Greater Threat To Trump’s Agenda Than Democrats
item.description: The defeat of Matt Gaetz’s nomination for attorney general shows that this time, Trump really does have to drain the swamp.

item.title: It’s Past Time We Bring Back The Washington Redskins
item.description: The Washington football franchise must right its previous wrong by bringing back its 'Redskins' team name.

item.title: Biden Rewards Planned Parenthood’s Baby Murder By Giving Its High Priestess A Presidential Medal Of Freedom
item.description: During the 13 years Cecile Richards led Planned Parenthood, more than 13 million babies were killed before their births in the United States.

item.title: Bob Casey Cries Uncle, Ending U.S. Senate Race Recount In Pennsylvania
item.description: Casey finally admitted defeat Thursday evening in a sober video posted on social media.
